name: Warera Mitsurin Tankentai!!
overview: Warera Mitsurin Tankentai!! let the player to become the captain of a group of archeologics explorers arrives at an island and they have to search for rare animals, minerals or old artifacts but they also have to fight with a rival group that is also there. and with island fierce animals. Meanwhile the player's group have to build building and facilities using wood that they have to cut, and also grab food on the island. In order for investigation to advance well, the player will have to make the right decisions. In addition, if unknown things such as fossil or rare plants are discovered, they will receive help from their sponsor, that can reinforce the soldiers and equipment. What the future will bring depends on the judgement of the captain!
